name: 郭宏源
objective:
瞭解工程系統中常用數學之原理及應用，內容包含：1. 常微分一階、二階及高階方程式之解法，2. 拉普拉斯 (Laplace) 變換及其在電路上之應用，3. 向量分析及其在電磁學上之應用。
1.Ordinary differential equations of the first order
2.Linear ordinary differential equations of the second order
3.Laplace transforms
4.Vector analysis and its application to electormagnetics
schedule:
01.Definitions and Terminology
02.Initial-Value Problems
03.Differential Equations as Mathematical Models
04.First-order Differential Equations
05.Separable Variables
06.Linear Equations
07.Exact Equations
08.A Numerical Method
09.Midterm Exam.
10.Modeling with Systems of First-Order DEs
11.Higher-order Differential Equations
12.Definition of the Laplace Transform
13.Inverse Transforms and Transforms of Derivatives
14.Systems of Linear Differential Equations
15.Fourier Series
16.Fourier Cosine and Sine Series
17.Fourier Transforms
18.Final Exam.
scorePolicy:
平時: 30%
期中考: 35%
期末考: 35%
materials: Dennis G. Zill and Michael R. Cullen, "Differential Equations-with Boundary-Value Problem"
